description: Try our easy to follow Sweetheart French Toast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sweetheart French Toast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the raspberry coulis, place raspberries and sugar in a small saucepan over medium-low heat and cook, breaking up fruit with a wooden spoon, until mixture reaches boiling point. Remove pan from heat and set aside.

In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla and sugar. Lightly grease a frying pan with butter and place over medium-low heat. Dip a slice of banana bread into egg mixture to coat both sides, then cook in pan for 2 minutes or until underside is golden. Flip and cook for a further 2 minutes or until underside is golden. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining banana bread and egg mixture.

Using a 3cm heart-shaped cookie cutter (or small sharp knife), cut out and remove a heart shape from the centre of French toast. Place toast onto serving plates, then fill cutouts with raspberry coulis and serve.
